title: PJM Hourly Energy Consumption Ratio 10x
description: This is a variation of the PJM Hourly Energy Consumption dataset. It is filtered to limit the history to be 10x the forecast length which is 72 time steps. This dataset contains data related to hourly level energy consumption in regions served by PJM Interconnection LLC (PJM).

forecastTarget.name: Energy_Consumption_GW
forecastTarget.description: Target variable representing energy consumption in gigawatt.
